ygData.subject: Re: Bard macros
ygData.msgSnippet: ... right as ... Did you put a /stopsong at the start of the macro to turn off any prior songs playing? I have a Charming macro of... /stopsong /g Charming %T
ygData.messageBody:
--- In eqbards@egroups.com, "Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4(n)"
<g4mntofcr@s...> wrote:

>I tried to set up a macro for one
> pulse of heal and two pulses of mana song. Didn't do something
right as
> neither one of them ever started up.
>
> Thanks
> Galtin of E'ci

Did you put a /stopsong at the start of the macro to turn off any
prior songs playing?

I have a Charming macro of...
/stopsong
/g Charming %T
/cast <charm>

I tried a complicated...
/pet backoff
/ass <Puller Name>
/pet attack
...with various /pause # statements and always ended up with my pet
just standing around looking stupid. Tried "/pet who is leader" in
there too as an additional alert to party members, but have not
redone
it since it got trimmed back down to "/pet attack" as I have just
been
charm kiting since.

I planned to try the one you said but haven't gotten around to
working
out the pauses... I wonder if having the last line hit hotkey 10 and
putting the key in slot 10 would keep it going. Best to test that
near a zone methinks in case I start an infinite loop.

Alwien
Bard of the 38th chord
Povar - Blades of Law
